details:
• Flat terrain with rolling hills
  • Dense forest with a mix of oak and pine trees
  • Small stream running through the property
  • Abundant wildlife, including deer and birds
  • Rock formations and outcroppings present
  • Soil suitable for farming and gardening
  • Several acres of open meadow
  • Located in a region with a moderate climate
  • Expansive views of the surrounding countryside
  • Scenic vistas from high points on the property

summary.landDetails: Forested, Stream, Rolling Hills, Moderate Climate, Scenic Views

title: Old Mill Farm
description:
Old Mill Farm is a beautiful property located in Lawrenceville, Georgia. These 10 acres of land are perfect for those looking to build their dream home or for those looking for a small farm. The land is flat and has plenty of space for gardening, raising livestock, or just enjoying the outdoors. The property is just a short drive from downtown Lawrenceville, which offers all the amenities you need. This is a great opportunity to own a piece of land in a charming, small town in the Southeast United States.





The property is priced at $450,000, which is a great value considering the size of the land and its location. With plenty of space and a desirable location, Old Mill Farm is a great opportunity for anyone looking to own a piece of land in the Southeast United States.
